action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The border is entirely filled with X's. Inside the border, there is an alternating pattern of X's and blank squares (represented by ▢). Starting from the second row, each row has three X's and two blank squares. The X's are in the first, third, and fifth positions, while the blank squares are in the second and fourth positions. This pattern repeats for the second, third, and fourth rows. The fifth row is the same as the first, with all X's.
continue
